title: （終於完）美國同塔利班達成協議 將於14個月內撤軍

replies.msg:
Just in: The U.S. and the Taliban have signed a historic accord after 18 years of war in Afghanistan.

The deal stipulates that the U.S. will begin the process of drawing down troops 8,600 in the first 135 days and withdraw forces from five bases.

All further reductions in troops will be conditioned-based and related to counterterrorism needs, and the Taliban upholding its commitments to not allowing Afghan soil to be used as a base for terrorism in the future.


https://t.co/LmYNJ0jsPh?amp=1

打左廿年得個桔。

US and Afghan Taliban sign deal leading to American troop withdrawal and further peace talks, after 18 years of war

https://t.co/9D57JqwtZH?amp=1
The US and Taliban sign a historic agreement that sets into motion the drawdown of American troops from Afghanistan cnn.it/2Tq8vGf
Afghan conflict: US and Taliban sign deal to end 18-year war https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-51689443
